law.catch_line: If an order issued by the Commissioner under § 27-103 of this subtitle or a report of the Commissio...
law.text: If an order issued by the Commissioner under § 27-103 of this subtitle or a report of the Commissioner made under § 27-104 of this subtitle does not charge a violation of this title, any intervenor in the proceedings may appeal from the order or report in the time and manner provided in this article for appeals from orders of the Commissioner generally.
